archimate:Facility.name: Chesterfield
archimate:Facility.documentation:
"653 boxes according to excel spreadsheet provided by POL (HSF update 20/04/22) 1400 boxes" Andy Wynn (SPMR relationship manager) documents; Files relating to Finance Service Centre; Records of SPMR interviews; Documents viewed in Winchester indicate that this site may hold documents relating to 'IMPACT' programme.
4,369 Excel entries On Relativity
26/08/2022 Hopefully by end of day, the Chesterfield boxes will have been moved to Oasis Wionchester where they will be scanned.
